name: WP Jalapeno
author: New Signature

sections.description:
WP Jalapeno integrates your DIA Salsa actions with your WordPress site. Install the plugin, enter in your Salsa credentials, select your action and paste the relevant tag into your post or page.

You’ll have the full power of DIA Salsa integrated into your WordPress site in a flash!
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Removing conflicting script with WordPress 3.3

1.0.2

  • Now supports WordPress 3.0
  • Disallow activation if PHP version < 5
  • Added support for restricted locations
  • New widget for rendering a form in the sidebar
  • New widget for rendering the most recent signatures
  • New field to make supporter anonymous
  • New field to provide optional comments
  • Provided default and help text for the host name config option
  • Added insert button to post editor
  • Added support for custom fields of the following types:
    • text line
    • picklist
    • yes/no

1.0.1

  • Changed the name of the plugin
  • Added default CSS capabilities to apply to all forms
  • Changed the form insertion tag

1.0.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Integrate DIA Salsa action forms seamlessly into your WordPress site.
description:
WP Jalapeno integrates your DIA Salsa actions with your WordPress site. Install the plugin, enter in your Salsa credentials, select your action and paste the relevant tag into your post or page.

You’ll have the full power of DIA Salsa integrated into your WordPress site in a flash!

screenshots.caption: Configure your connection to the Salsa servers.

The main configuration page for the action forms. Drag and drop your desired fields to create the form. The following may be available as draggable fields, depending on how your action is configured in Salsa:
  • Supporter fields
One or more sets of content to be sent

tags.dia-salsa-actions-forms-newsignature-jal: dia salsa actions forms newsignature jalapeno
